name: Deep, In the Forest
description:
Game is deck building roguelite card game with rpg elements in colorful family friendly setting of forest full of human-like animals under rule of Mad King.

Player’s hero used to be close to the royal family, now accused of crimes he never did related to missing Princess. To prove his innocence and restore peace in the forest, the hero must fight his way through foes until he meets the Mad King and his counselor.
Hero may encounter locals and Barons of the different regions to become stronger and gain support, or go straight to the King himself.

The game emphasize replayability through big variety of card, items, buffs combinations and encounters.
